column5: With its own bath and your own private entrance this clean and cozy room may be just what you are looking for. Our lovely, 1930's, Spanish-Deco duplex is located in a historic neighborhood only a 5 min drive to downtown with easy access to bus routes & highways.  Your room is located on the first floor of our duplex and has its own private entrance in front of the house and a full private bath.  The room is furnished with a full sized IKEA futon bed with 4\
